effect.sword_shield: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to thunderbolt.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.
